title: 图形绘制与显示错误码
summary: ArkGraphics 2D Graphics 模块的 图形绘制与显示错误码，提供相关接口和功能说明。

structure.title: 图形绘制与显示错误码

sections.title: 25900001 参数值异常
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

The parameter value is out of range.

**错误描述**

当参数值超出参数范围要求时，系统会报此错误码。

**可能原因**

参数值超出接

sections.title: 25900002 文件未找到
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

File not found. The specified file does not exist or the path is incorrect.

**错误描述**

文件

sections.title: 25900003 打开文件失败
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Failed to open file. The file cannot be opened due to permission or I/O issues.

**错误描述**

sections.title: 25900004 文件定位失败
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

File seek failed. The system failed to reposition the file read pointer.

**错误描述**

文件定位失

sections.title: 25900005 获取文件大小失败
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Failed to get the file size. The system was unable to obtain the file size information.

sections.title: 25900006 读取文件失败
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Failed to read file. The file could not be read completely or contains unreadable data.

sections.title: 25900007 文件为空
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Empty file. The specified file is empty.

**错误描述**

指定文件为空。

**可能原因**

文件大小为0字节。

**处理步骤*

sections.title: 25900008 文件损坏
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Corrupted file. The file content is invalid or damaged and cannot be parsed.

**错误描述**

文
